verses.verse: כֹּה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> the LORD לִמְשִׁיחוֹ֮ <WH4899> to his anointed לְכ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> to Cyrus אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whom הֶחֱזַ֣קְתִּי <WH2388> I have holden בִֽימִינ֗וֹ <WH3225> whose right hand לְרַד־ <WH7286> to subdue לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> nations וּמָתְנֵ֥י <WH4975> the loins מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> of kings אֲפַתֵּ֑חַ <WH6605> him and I will loose לִפְתֹּ֤חַ <WH6605> to open לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before דְּלָתַ֔יִם <WH1817> him the two leaved gates וּשְׁעָרִ֖ים <WH8179> and the gates לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִסָּגֵֽרוּ׃ <WH5462> shall not be shut

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> before אֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> will go וַהֲדוּרִ֖ים <WH1921> the crooked places [אֹושִׁר כ] (אֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <WH3474> direct ק) דַּלְת֤וֹת <WH1817> the gates נְחוּשָׁה֙ <WH5154> of brass אֲשַׁבֵּ֔ר <WH7665> I will break in pieces וּבְרִיחֵ֥י <WH1280> the bars בַרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> of iron אֲגַדֵּֽעַ׃ <WH1438> and cut in sunder

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will give לְךָ֙ אוֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> thee the treasures חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> of darkness וּמַטְמֻנֵ֖י <WH4301> and hidden riches מִסְתָּרִ֑ים <WH4565> of secret places לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תֵּדַ֗ע <WH3045> that thou mayest know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that it אֲנִ֧י <WH589> is I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that I the LORD הַקּוֹרֵ֥א <WH7121> which call בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> [thee] by thy name אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> [am] the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> the sake עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> my servant's יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> For Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> sake and Israel בְּחִירִ֑י <WH972> mine elect וָאֶקְרָ֤א <WH7121> I have even called לְךָ֙ בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> thee by thy name אֲכַנְּךָ֖ <WH3655> I have surnamed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH3045> thee though thou hast not known

אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there ע֔וֹד <WH5750> other זוּלָתִ֖י <WH2108> beside אֵ֣ין <WH369> is no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> and [there is] none else [there is] no God אֲאַזֶּרְךָ֖ <WH247> me I girded וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH3045> thee though thou hast not known

לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of יֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> That they may know מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> from the rising שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> of the sun וּמִמַּ֣עֲרָבָ֔הּ <WH4628> and from the west כִּי־ <WH3588> there אֶ֖פֶס <WH657> that [there is] none בִּלְעָדָ֑י <WH1107> beside אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> me I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> other

יוֹצֵ֥ר <WH3335> I form אוֹר֙ <WH216> the light וּבוֹרֵ֣א <WH1254> and create חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> darkness עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> I make שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> peace וּב֣וֹרֵא <WH1254> and create רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> do כָל־ <WH3605> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these ס

הַרְעִ֤יפוּ <WH7491> Drop down שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> ye heavens מִמַּ֔עַל <WH4605> from above וּשְׁחָקִ֖ים <WH7834> and let the skies יִזְּלוּ־ <WH5140> pour down צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> righteousness תִּפְתַּח־ <WH6605> open אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> let the earth וְיִפְרוּ־ <WH6509> and let them bring forth יֶ֗שַׁע <WH3468> salvation וּצְדָקָ֤ה <WH6666> and let righteousness תַצְמִ֙יחַ֙ <WH6779> spring up יַ֔חַד <WH3162> together אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD בְּרָאתִֽיו׃ <WH1254> have created ס

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Woe רָ֚ב <WH7378> unto him that striveth אֶת־ <WH853> יֹ֣צְר֔וֹ <WH3335> with his Maker חֶ֖רֶשׂ <WH2789> [Let] the potsherd אֶת־ <WH853> חַרְשֵׂ֣י <WH2789> [strive] with the potsherds אֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the earth הֲיֹאמַ֨ר <WH559> say חֹ֤מֶר <WH2563> Shall the clay לְיֹֽצְרוֹ֙ <WH3335> to him that fashioneth מַֽה־ <WH4100> What תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> it What makest וּפָעָלְךָ֖ <WH6467> thou? or thy work אֵין־ <WH369> has יָדַ֥יִם <WH3027> able לֽוֹ׃ ס

ה֛וֹי <WH1945> Woe אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> unto him that saith לְאָ֖ב <WH1> unto [his] father מַה־ <WH4100> What תּוֹלִ֑יד <WH3205> What begettest וּלְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> thou? or to the woman מַה־ <WH4100> to what תְּחִילִֽין׃ <WH2342> What hast thou brought forth ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֧ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיֹצְר֑וֹ <WH3335> and his Maker הָאֹתִיּ֣וֹת <WH857> me of things to come שְׁאָל֔וּנִי <WH7592> Ask עַל־ <WH5921> about בָּנַ֛י <WH1121> concerning my sons וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning פֹּ֥עַל <WH6467> and concerning the work יָדַ֖י <WH3027> of my hands תְּצַוֻּֽנִי׃ <WH6680> command

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> is I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> I have made אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְאָדָ֖ם <WH120> man עָלֶ֣יהָ <WH5921> and בָרָ֑אתִי <WH1254> and created אֲנִ֗י <WH589> my יָדַי֙ <WH3027> upon it I [even] my hands נָט֣וּ <WH5186> have stretched out שָׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> the heavens וְכָל־ <WH3605> all צְבָאָ֖ם <WH6635> and all their host צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> have I commanded

אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I הַעִירֹתִ֣הֽוּ <WH5782> I have raised him up בְצֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> in righteousness וְכָל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> all his ways אֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <WH3474> and I will direct הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He יִבְנֶ֤ה <WH1129> he shall build עִירִי֙ <WH5892> my city וְגָלוּתִ֣י <WH1546> my captives יְשַׁלֵּ֔חַ <WH7971> and he shall let go לֹ֤א <WH3808> Without בִמְחִיר֙ <WH4242> not for price וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Without בְשֹׁ֔חַד <WH7810> nor reward אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God יְגִ֨יעַ <WH3018> The labour מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וּֽסְחַר־ <WH5505> and merchandise כּוּשׁ֮ <WH3568> of Ethiopia וּסְבָאִים֮ <WH5436> and of the Sabeans אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> men מִדָּה֒ <WH4060> of stature עָלַ֤יִךְ <WH5921> and יַעֲבֹ֙רוּ֙ <WH5674> shall come over וְלָ֣ךְ יִֽהְי֔וּ <WH1961> become אַחֲרַ֣יִךְ <WH310> after יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> will walk בַּזִּקִּ֖ים <WH2131> thee in chains יַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <WH5674> they shall come over וְאֵלַ֤יִךְ <WH413> and יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּוּ֙ <WH7812> and they shall fall down אֵלַ֣יִךְ <WH413> to you יִתְפַּלָּ֔לוּ <WH6419> unto thee they shall make supplication אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Surely בָּ֥ךְ אֵ֛ל <WH410> unto thee [saying] Surely God וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there ע֖וֹד <WH5750> else אֶ֥פֶס <WH657> [is] in thee and [there is] none else [there is] no אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

אָכֵ֕ן <WH403> Verily אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אֵ֣ל <WH410> thou [art] a God מִסְתַּתֵּ֑ר <WH5641> that hidest אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> thyself O God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> the Saviour

בּ֥וֹשׁוּ <WH954> They shall be ashamed וְגַֽם־ <WH1571> and even נִכְלְמ֖וּ <WH3637> and also confounded כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> all יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> together הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> all of them they shall go בַכְּלִמָּ֔ה <WH3639> to confusion חָרָשֵׁ֖י <WH2796> [that are] makers צִירִֽים׃ <WH6736> of idols

יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> [But] Israel נוֹשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> shall be saved בַּיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> in the LORD תְּשׁוּעַ֖ת <WH8668> salvation עוֹלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> with an everlasting לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> ye shall not be ashamed וְלֹא־ <WH3808> or תִכָּלְמ֖וּ <WH3637> nor confounded עַד־ <WH5704> against ע֥וֹלְמֵי <WH5769> world עַֽד׃ <WH5703> without end פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> thus אָֽמַר־ <WH559> For thus saith יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> the LORD בּוֹרֵ֨א <WH1254> that created הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> the heavens ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God יֹצֵ֨ר <WH3335> himself that formed הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְעֹשָׂהּ֙ <WH6213> and made ה֣וּא <WH1931> He כֽוֹנְנָ֔הּ <WH3559> it he hath established לֹא־ <WH3808> not תֹ֥הוּ <WH8414> it not in vain בְרָאָ֖הּ <WH1254> it he created לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> it to be inhabited יְצָרָ֑הּ <WH3335> he formed אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> else

לֹ֧א <WH3808> not בַסֵּ֣תֶר <WH5643> in secret דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> I have not spoken בִּמְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> place אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in a dark לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not אָמַ֛רְתִּי <WH559> I said לְזֶ֥רַע <WH2233> not unto the seed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob תֹּ֣הוּ <WH8414> ye me in vain בַקְּשׁ֑וּנִי <WH1245> Seek אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> I the LORD דֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> speak צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> righteousness מַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> I declare מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> things that are right

הִקָּבְצ֥וּ <WH6908> Assemble וָבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> yourselves and come הִֽתְנַגְּשׁ֥וּ <WH5066> draw near יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together פְּלִיטֵ֣י <WH6412> ye [that are] escaped הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the nations לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> they have no knowledge הַנֹּֽשְׂאִים֙ <WH5375> that set up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> the wood פִּסְלָ֔ם <WH6459> of their graven image וּמִתְפַּלְלִ֔ים <WH6419> and pray אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֖ל <WH410> unto a god לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> [that] cannot save

הַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> Tell וְהַגִּ֔ישׁוּ <WH5066> ye and bring [them] near אַ֥ף <WH637> Indeed יִֽוָּעֲצ֖וּ <WH3289> yea let them take counsel יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together מִ֣י <WH4310> Who הִשְׁמִיעַ֩ <WH8085> who hath declared זֹ֨את <WH2063> likewise מִקֶּ֜דֶם <WH6924> aforetime מֵאָ֣ז <WH227> for הִגִּידָ֗הּ <WH5046> declared הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Jehovah וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> [there is] none ע֤וֹד <WH5750> other אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God מִבַּלְעָדַ֔י <WH1107> else beside אֵֽל־ <WH410> God צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> me a just וּמוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <WH3467> and a Saviour אַ֖יִן <WH369> There זוּלָתִֽי׃ <WH2108> beside

פְּנוּ־ <WH6437> Look אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me וְהִוָּשְׁע֖וּ <WH3467> unto me and be ye saved כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֲנִי־ <WH589> I אֵ֖ל <WH410> for I [am] God וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> other

בִּ֣י נִשְׁבַּ֔עְתִּי <WH7650> I have sworn יָצָ֨א <WH3318> is gone out מִפִּ֧י <WH6310> of my mouth צְדָקָ֛ה <WH6666> [in] righteousness דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> by myself the word וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and will not יָשׁ֑וּב <WH7725> and shall not return כִּי־ <WH3588> for לִי֙ תִּכְרַ֣ע <WH3766> shall bow כָּל־ <WH3605> every בֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1290> That unto me every knee תִּשָּׁבַ֖ע <WH7650> shall swear כָּל־ <WH3605> every לָשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH3956> every tongue

אַ֧ךְ <WH389> Only בַּיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> in the LORD לִ֥י אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Surely shall [one] say צְדָק֣וֹת <WH6666> have I righteousness וָעֹ֑ז <WH5797> and strength עָדָיו֙ <WH5704> against יָב֣וֹא <WH935> [even] to him shall [men] come וְיֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <WH954> against him shall be ashamed כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all הַנֶּחֱרִ֥ים <WH2734> and all that are incensed בּֽוֹ׃
בַּיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> In the LORD יִצְדְּק֥וּ <WH6663> be justified וְיִֽתְהַלְל֖וּ <WH1984> and shall glory כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> shall all the seed יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
